title: RP ADDTO: Basic properties of closures

blocks.name: cleq2lem
blocks.content: Equality implies bijection. (Contributed by RP, 24-Jul-2020.)

blocks.name: cbvcllem
blocks.content: Change of bound variable in class of supersets of a with a property. (Contributed by RP, 24-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvcllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w0)), cab(s1, wa(wss(c0, cv(s1)), w1)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  cbvabv(s0, s1, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w0), wa(wss(c0, cv(s1)), w1))
  cleq2lem(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, w0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(c0, cv(s1)), w1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wss(c0, cv(s0)), w0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvcllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  âŠ¢ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w0)} = { s1 |(c0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ w1)}
  âŠ£ (s0 = s1 â†’(w0 â†” w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w1)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  cbvabv(s0, s1, (c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w0), (c0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ w1))
  cleq2lem(s0, s1, c0, w0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 âŠ† s1, w1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 âŠ† s0, w0)
  diff.wss.s(s1, c0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: intabssd
blocks.content: When for each element ` y ` there is a subset ` A ` which may substituted for ` x ` such that ` y ` satisfying ` ch ` implies ` x ` satisfies ` ps ` then the intersection of all ` x ` that satisfy ` ps ` is a subclass the intersection of all ` y ` that satisfy ` ch ` . (Contributed by RP, 17-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm intabssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cint(cab(s0, w1)), cint(cab(s1, w2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cv(s1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, cint(cab(s0, w1)), cint(cab(s1, w2)), w0)
  3imtr4g(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cint(cab(s0, w1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cint(cab(s1, w2))), wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wi(w2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  alrimdv(s1, w0, wal(s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wi(w2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  spcimdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wi(w2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  imim12d(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), w2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  sylan9r(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq2(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))
  sseld(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1), w0)
  elintab(s0, cv(hs0), w1)
  elintab(s1, cv(hs0), w2)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(cint(cab(s0, w1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(cab(s1, w2)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wal.s(s1, s0, wi(w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  diff.wi.s(s1, w1, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w2, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm intabssd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ â‹‚ { s0 | w1 } âŠ† â‹‚ { s1 | w2 })
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âˆˆ c1)
  âŠ£ ((w0 âˆ§ s0 = c0)â†’(w2 â†’ w1))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âŠ† s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w2)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w0)
  âŠ£ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, â‹‚ { s0 | w1 }, â‹‚ { s1 | w2 }, w0)
  3imtr4g(w0, hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s0 | w1 }, hs0 âˆˆ â‹‚ { s1 | w2 }, âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0)), âˆ€(s1,(w2 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s1)))
  alrimdv(s1, w0, âˆ€(s0,(w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0)), (w2 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s1))
  spcimdv(s0, c0, c1, w0, (w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0), (w2 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s1))
  imim12d((w0 âˆ§ s0 = c0), w1, hs0 âˆˆ s0, w2, hs0 âˆˆ s1)
  sylan9r(w0, s0 = c0, hs0 âˆˆ s0, hs0 âˆˆ s1, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  biimpd(s0 = c0, hs0 âˆˆ s0, hs0 âˆˆ c0)
  eleq2(s0, c0, hs0)
  sseld(hs0, c0, s1, w0)
  elintab(s0, hs0, w1)
  elintab(s1, hs0, w2)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(â‹‚ { s0 | w1 })
  diff.hs0.c(â‹‚ { s1 | w2 })
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wal.s(s1, s0, (w1 â†’ hs0 âˆˆ s0))
  diff.wi.s(s1, w1, hs0 âˆˆ s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, w2, hs0 âˆˆ s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: clublem
blocks.content: If a superset ` Y ` of ` X ` possesses the property parameterized in ` x ` in ` ps ` , then ` Y ` is a superset of the closure of that property for the set ` X ` . (Contributed by RP, 23-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm clublem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), c1), wcel(c1, cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))))
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(c1, cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), wss(c0, c1), w2)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), wa(wss(c0, c1), w2)), wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), w2), wcel(c1, universe)))
  a1d(w0, wa(wss(c0, c1), w2), wcel(c1, universe))
  elab3g(s0, c1, universe, wa(wss(c0, c1), w2), wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))
  cleq2lem(cv(s0), c1, c0, w1, w2)
  intss1(c1, cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(c0, c1), w2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clublem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ â‹‚ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)} âŠ† c1)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  âŠ£ (s0 = c1 â†’(w1 â†” w2))
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ c0 âŠ† c1)
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’ w2)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  syl(w0, â‹‚ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)} âŠ† c1, c1 âˆˆ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)})
  mpbir2and(w0, c1 âˆˆ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)}, c0 âŠ† c1, w2)
  syl(w0, (c1 âˆˆ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)} â†”(c0 âŠ† c1 âˆ§ w2)), ((c0 âŠ† c1 âˆ§ w2)â†’ c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ))
  a1d(w0, (c0 âŠ† c1 âˆ§ w2), c1 âˆˆ ğ•Œ)
  elab3g(s0, c1, universe, (c0 âŠ† c1 âˆ§ w2), (c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1))
  cleq2lem(s0, c1, c0, w1, w2)
  intss1(c1, { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)})
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 âŠ† c1, w2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: clss2lem
blocks.content: The closure of a property is a superset of the closure of a less restrictive property. (Contributed by RP, 24-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm clss2lem(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2)))), wss(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2)), cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))))
  sylib(w0, wss(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2)), cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2), w1)))
  alrimiv(s0, w0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2), w1))
  adantld(w0, wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2, w1)
  bitr4i(wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2), w1)), wss(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2)), cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2), wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))))
  albii(s0, wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2), w1), wi(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2), wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)))
  pm5.3(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2, w1)
  ss2ab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2), wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))
  intss(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w2)), cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm clss2lem(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  âŠ¢ (w0 â†’ â‹‚ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)} âŠ† â‹‚ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)})
  âŠ£ (w0 â†’(w2 â†’ w1))
  âŠ£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, â‹‚ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)} âŠ† â‹‚ { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)}, { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)} âŠ† { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)})
  sylib(w0, { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)} âŠ† { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)}, âˆ€(s0,((c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)â†’ w1)))
  alrimiv(s0, w0, ((c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)â†’ w1))
  adantld(w0, c0 âŠ† s0, w2, w1)
  bitr4i(âˆ€(s0,((c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)â†’ w1)), { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)} âŠ† { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)}, âˆ€(s0,((c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)â†’(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1))))
  albii(s0, ((c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)â†’ w1), ((c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)â†’(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)))
  pm5.3(c0 âŠ† s0, w2, w1)
  ss2ab(s0, (c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2), (c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1))
  intss({ s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w2)}, { s0 |(c0 âŠ† s0 âˆ§ w1)})
}

blocks.name: dfid7
blocks.content: Definition of identity relation as the trivial closure. (Contributed by RP, 26-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfid7(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(cid, cmpt(s0, universe, cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cid, cmpt(s0, universe, cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru)))), cmpt(s0, universe, cv(s0)))
  dfid4(s0)
  mpteq2i(s0, universe, cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru))), cv(s0))
  eqtri(cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru))), cv(s0), cint(cab(s1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  inteqi(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru)), cab(s1, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  abbii(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  bitri(wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru), wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(wtru, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ancom(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wtru)
  truan(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  intmin2(s1, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfid7(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  âŠ¢ = =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹‚ { s1 |(s0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ T)})
  âŠ£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cid, (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ â‹‚ { s1 |(s0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ T)}), (s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ s0))
  dfid4(s0)
  mpteq2i(s0, universe, â‹‚ { s1 |(s0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ T)}, s0)
  eqtri(â‹‚ { s1 |(s0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ T)}, s0, â‹‚ { s1 | s0 âŠ† s1 })
  inteqi({ s1 |(s0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ T)}, { s1 | s0 âŠ† s1 })
  abbii(s1, (s0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ T), s0 âŠ† s1)
  bitri((s0 âŠ† s1 âˆ§ T), s0 âŠ† s1, (T âˆ§ s0 âŠ† s1))
  ancom(s0 âŠ† s1, wtru)
  truan(s0 âŠ† s1)
  intmin2(s1, s0)
  vex(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mptrcllem
blocks.content: Show two versions of a closure with reflexive properties are equal. (Contributed by RP, 19-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mptrcllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, c0, cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s1)), crn(cv(s1)))), cv(s1))))))), cmpt(s0, c0, cint(cab(s2, wa(wss(cun(cv(s0), cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), cv(s2)), w1)))))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s1)), crn(cv(s1)))), cv(s1)))))), universe))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cint(cab(s2, wa(wss(cun(cv(s0), cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), cv(s2)), w1))), universe))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w2)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w3)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w4)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cint(cab(s2, wa(wss(cun(cv(s0), cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), cv(s2)), w1)))), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cint(cab(s2, wa(wss(cun(cv(s0), cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0))))), cv(s2)), w1)))), wb(wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s1)), crn(cv(s1)))), cv(s1)), w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s1)), crn(cv(s1)))), cv(s1))))))), wb(w1, w4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w4)
} = {

blocks.name: cotrintab
blocks.content: The intersection of a class is a transitive relation if membership in the class implies the member is a transitive relation. (Contributed by RP, 28-Oct-2020.)

thm rclexi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {

} = {
  mp2an(wcel(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))), universe), wss(c0, cun(c0, cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cun(c0, cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), crn(cun(c0, cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))))), cun(c0, cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))))

  dmresi(cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))

  ssun1(cdm(c0), crn(c0))

  3eqtri(crn(cun(c0, cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), cun(crn(c0), crn(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), cun(crn(c0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  rnun(c0, cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  uneq2i(crn(c0), crn(cres(cid, cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  rnresi(cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  mpbi(wceq(cun(crn(c0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), wss(crn(c0), cun(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  ssun2(crn(c0), cdm(c0))

blocks.content: If a relation exists then the transitive closure has an upper bound. (Contributed by RP, 24-Jul-2020.)

thm trclubgNEW(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {

thm rtrclexi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wa(wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wss(cres(cid, cun(cdm(cv(s0)), crn(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))))), universe)

blocks.name: clrellem
blocks.content: When the property ` ps ` holds for a relation substituted for ` x ` , then the closure on that property is a relation if the base set is a relation. (Contributed by RP, 30-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm clrellem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wrel(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), ccnv(ccnv(c1))), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrel(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  3syl(w0, wrel(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)))), wex(s0, wa(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1), wrel(cv(s0)))), wrex(hs0, cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)), wrel(cv(hs0))))
  elabd(s0, ccnv(ccnv(c1)), w0, wa(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1), wrel(cv(s0))), wa(wa(wss(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c1))), w2), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c1)))))
  3syl(w0, wcel(ccnv(ccnv(c1)), universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(ccnv(c1), universe))
  cnvexg(c1, universe)
  cnvexg(ccnv(c1), universe)
  jca31(w0, wss(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c1))), w2, wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c1))))
  eqsstr3d(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c1)), ccnv(ccnv(c0)), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), c0), wrel(c0))
  dfrel2(c0)
  3syl(w0, wss(ccnv(ccnv(c0)), ccnv(ccnv(c1))), wss(c0, c1), wss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1)))
  cnvss(c0, c1)
  cnvss(ccnv(c0), ccnv(c1))
  a1i(w0, wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c1))))
  relcnv(ccnv(c1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), ccnv(ccnv(c1))), wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1), wrel(cv(s0)), wa(wss(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c1))), w2), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c1))))
  cleq2lem(cv(s0), ccnv(ccnv(c1)), c0, w1, w2)
  releq(cv(s0), ccnv(ccnv(c1)))
  biimpri(wex(s0, wa(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1), wrel(cv(s0)))), wrex(hs0, cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)), wrel(cv(hs0))))
  rexab2(hs0, s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1), wrel(cv(hs0)), wrel(cv(s0)))
  releq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  relint(hs0, cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wss(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c1))), w2), wrel(ccnv(ccnv(c1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wss(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c1))), w2)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, ccnv(ccnv(c1)))
  diff.wrel.s(s0, ccnv(ccnv(c1)))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, ccnv(c1))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1))
  diff.hs0.w(wrel(cv(s0)))
  diff.wrel.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: clcnvlem
blocks.content: When ` A ` , an upper bound of the closure, exists and certain substitutions hold the converse of the closure is equal to the closure of the converse. (Contributed by RP, 18-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm clcnvlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), w1)))), cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(ccnv(c0), cv(s1)), w2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), cun(ccnv(cv(s1)), cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))))), wi(w2, w1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0)))), wi(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| wi(w0, w3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

blocks.name: cnvtrucl0
blocks.content: The converse of the trivial closure is equal to the closure of the converse. (Contributed by RP, 18-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnvtrucl0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wtru)))), cint(cab(s1, wa(wss(ccnv(c0), cv(s1)), wtru)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  clcnvlem(s0, s1, c0, c0, wcel(c0, c1), wtru, wtru, wtru)
  idd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s0), cun(ccnv(cv(s1)), cdif(c0, ccnv(ccnv(c0)))))), wtru)
  idd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(s1), ccnv(cv(s0)))), wtru)
  biidd(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wtru)
  ssidd(c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  elex(c0, c1)
  trud(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cnvtrcl0
blocks.content: The converse of the transitive closure is equal to the closure of the converse. (Contributed by RP, 18-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: dmtrcl
blocks.content: The domain of the transitive closure is equal to the domain of its base relation. (Contributed by RP, 1-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmtrcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))), cdm(c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqssd(cdm(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))), cdm(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl6sseq(cdm(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))), cdm(c0), cdm(cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cdm(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))), cdm(cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))), wss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  trclubg(s0, c0, c1)
  dmss(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))), cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))))
  eqtri(cdm(cun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), cdm(c0), cun(cdm(c0), cdm(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))))
  dmun(c0, cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
  mpbi(wceq(cun(cdm(c0), cdm(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))), cdm(c0)), wss(cdm(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cdm(c0)))
  dmxpss(cdm(c0), crn(c0))
  ssequn2(cdm(cxp(cdm(c0), crn(c0))), cdm(c0))
  mp1i(wcel(c0, c1), wss(cdm(c0), cdm(cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))))), wss(c0, cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))))))
  ssmin(s0, c0, wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  dmss(c0, cint(cab(s0, wa(wss(c0, cv(s0)), wss(ccom(cv(s0), cv(s0)), cv(s0))))))
}
